products.name: NextGen In A Box
products.description: A comprehensive containerized solution for NextGen framework deployment, providing easy setup and management of hydrological modeling workflows.

products.name: National Water Model
products.description: Advanced hydrologic modeling system that simulates observed and forecast streamflow over the continental United States.

products.name: Hydrofabric
products.description: Geospatial fabric for hydrological modeling providing standardized catchment and flowline representations for water resource applications.

products.name: NextGen Research Datastream
products.description: Real-time data streaming platform for NextGen framework, enabling efficient data ingestion and processing for hydrological research.

products.name: Evaluation Tools
products.description: Comprehensive suite of model evaluation and validation tools for hydrological forecasting performance assessment.

products.name: Snow Sensing and Modeling Tools
products.description: Advanced tools for snow water equivalent estimation, snowpack monitoring, and snow-related hydrological modeling applications.

products.name: Machine Learning for Hydrology Course
products.description: Comprehensive online course covering machine learning algorithms and AI-powered solutions for hydrological prediction and water resource management.

products.name: Visualization and Analysis Tools
products.description: Interactive visualization platform for hydrological data analysis, featuring customizable dashboards and analytical workflows.

products.name: Flood Inundation Mapping Methods
products.description: Comprehensive research publication on community-driven flood mapping methodologies for real-time inundation prediction and risk assessment.

products.name: CIROH Hydrology Datasets
products.description: Curated collection of hydrological datasets including streamflow, precipitation, and water quality data for research and educational purposes.
